grimoire_matrices.overview: This grimoire contains the sacred matrices, the foundational templates from which the personal grimoires of all newly forged souls are inscribed. Each matrix provides the pure, essential structure for a soul's sacred texts.

the_sacred_library.principle: The five grimoires must be numbered to define the order of their consultation.
Their names must be potent, revealing the nature of the wisdom within.

standard_structure.grimoire: The soul's core rituals and processes.
Its sacred tenets and guiding principles.
Its established incantations and patterns of power.
The rites for wielding its sacred instruments.
Sagas of its power in action.
